Title: Provides that policies which provide hospital, surgical or medical coverage shall provide coverage for hysterectomies
Summary: Provides that insurance policies which provide hospital, surgical or medical coverage shall provide coverage for hysterectomies; provides that such coverage shall include inpatient hospital coverage for a minimum period of seventy-two hours after surgery.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to coverage of hysterectomies
